text: Adrenaline is the first studio album by American metal band, Deftones. Adrenaline was released on October 3, 1995. The album was originally known as Communion but was later changed to Adrenaline. The album was ranked as #33 on music critic Piero Scaruffi's list of best metal albums of all times. ==Songs== idk ==References== Category:1995 albums Category:Deftones Category:Deftones albums Category:Nu metal albums
title: Adrenaline (album)
